summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MDM Grupo partner and sales management application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical Select component issues preventing Sales page functionality and modal overlay problems in forms.

ui_bugs.issue: React error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string' preventing Sales page from loading
ui_bugs.affected_functionality: Sales creation, editing, and listing completely broken

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepting pointer events preventing form interactions
ui_bugs.selector: Dialog overlays in Operators and other forms
ui_bugs.affected_functionality: Cannot complete form submissions in modal dialogs

integration_issues.issue: Sales page completely inaccessible due to Select component errors

passed_tests: Partners CRUD operations (create, list, search, edit)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select component issues in Sales page - empty value props causing React errors. Fix modal overlay z-index issues preventing form interactions. Sales functionality is completely broken and needs immediate attention.
